programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson investigates allegations against a popular radio personality; Rollins goes under cover when a shocking confession leads to another crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A home invasion and kidnapping lead the SVU to a shocking discovery; Muncy tries to fit in with the squad.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the case against a popular sports star falls through, Benson digs into the suspect's past to uncover additional victims; Velasco is disappointed when he meets one of his heroes.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: As Rudy and Deck search for a missing nurse, their investigation suggests a dark conspiracy at play.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson walks into a hostage situation at a neighborhood restaurant; Rollins tries to help her father after he's hospitalized.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An ex-convict who sexually assaulted prostitutes appears to have been killed by a would-be victim, then another homicide suggests the woman may be a manipulative serial killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Evidence points to an angry ex-boyfriend when a cocktail waitress is murdered outside a popular nightspot.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives hunt for the sadist who tortured a senile old woman (Jane Powell), investigating her nursing home, as well as her scheming son (Jay Thomas).

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A Jacksonville, Fla., firefighter discovers a disturbingly violent scene in his darkened bedroom on a Halloween weekend.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A Jacksonville, Fla., firefighter discovers a disturbingly violent scene in his darkened bedroom on a Halloween weekend.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Department of Justice Agent Lance Hamilton asks Sam for assistance in locating a former U.S. Border Patrol tactical officer who disappeared following a threat by the cartel.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After a Navy SEAL is attacked while moonlighting at a security job for a successful marijuana dispensary, Sam personally vows to apprehend the suspect out of respect for the Navy SEAL brotherhood.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After Anna Kolcheck escapes from prison with her cellmate, Callen and the NCIS team assist with the investigation and try to locate her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a 15-year-old who was part of a group of kids who put a transgender teen in the hospital is tried as an adult, the SVU team wonders whether the punishment fits the crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the 13-year-old daughter of a reality-TV family discovers she's pregnant, the team investigates.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Sgt. Olivia Benson attempts to thwart a violent home invasion, she gets more than she bargains for and becomes a hostage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An online pedophile ring -- including two high-profile suspects -- is targeted in an undercover sting.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Barba must drop rape charges against a popular actor due to lack of evidence, Rollins decides to take matters into her own hands.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Carisi poses as a homeless man at a shelter to see if one of the resident sex offenders is tied to a string of rapes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU investigates when a contestant from a reality dating series says she was raped; the producers of the series make Benson and the team part of the show.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young boy is found alone in Central Park, the search for his parents leads to evidence of a planned mass-casualty event in the city; the SVU works with the joint-terrorism task force to identify the suspects and the motive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: One day after a convicted rapist is exonerated by DNA evidence, a shocking new crime forces Fin and the team to search for the whereabouts of the man again.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A sexually assaulted athlete's secret double life could destroy her Olympic career and ruin the case against her attacker; Rollins' sister is released from prison on parole.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a sergeant's son is accused of rape, Benson is put in a difficult position and forced to make a choice between loyalty and duty.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman who is sexually assaulted by a masked man believes her attacker is the same man who was jailed for stalking her; Tucker thinks about retirement and a future with Benson.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The case of a 6-year-old boy who disappeared from his bed in the midst of his mother's wild, drug-fueled party causes Benson to think about her own role as a mother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU begins investigating members of a top youth hockey team after a savage hazing takes place in a locker room.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a young woman is raped by a member of her church group, Barba argues that the First Amendment doesn't entitle a person to break the law.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a crucial witness in the case of a fatal hate crime against a Muslim family is deported, Barba must drop the charges against a suspect, resulting in rising tensions between communities on either side of the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The release of a suspect in a hate crime case leaves Benson and Barba caught between two families seeking justice; as public protests escalate to violence, Benson goes to desperate lengths to make an arrest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the second leg of the 2003/04 UEFA Champions League quarter-final between Deportivo La Coruna and AC Milan at the Riazor Stadium. Milan led 4-0 from the first leg.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2013/14 UEFA Champions League group stage tie between Galatasaray and Real Madrid in Istanbul. It would end up being Galatasaray's heaviest home defeat in Europe.

programme.desc: As Rwanda prepares to host a historic first UCI Road World Championship on African soil, we delve into an inspiring cycling revolution that is unfolding across the continent.

programme.desc: We revisit the classic middleweight bout between Robert Whittaker and Yoel Romero which took place at UFC 213 in Las Vegas in 2018.
